ref: 1675 *ujjharati ʻ pours out, places, touches ʼ. [√*jhar]
Pk. ujjharia -- ʻ thrown, scattered, glanced at sideways ʼ, ujjhalia -- ʻ thrown ʼ;
G. ujharṛo m. ʻ scratch ʼ, ujhraṛvũ ʻ to get the skin scratched ʼ, ujharṛātũ ʻ scratching, glancing ʼ; --
Kho. uẓúrik ʻ to sprinkle (water) ʼ with ẓ < *ud -- gẓhar -- . See Morgenstierne NTS xiii 238. -- Cf. *ujjhalati.
